name: Privia Health
tag_list: health, wellness, medicine, doctors, physicians, concierge, disease-management, medical-home, pcmh, personal-health-records, phr, emr
overview:
Privia Health is a rapidly growing wellness and care management company that partners with top doctors to keep patients healthy, and better manage disease. Privia’s membership programs significantly enhance the doctor-patient relationship - combining the latest web and social networking technologies, real-time remote monitoring of a patient’s key health data, daily progress tracking on custom individual wellness plans, and a patient relationship management system that proactively identities care gaps, and alerts patients and their doctor when attention is needed.

Privia offers its members a more personal and convenient healthcare experience delivered through its national high performance network of top doctors. Privia’s prevention, wellness, and care management programs are coordinated through a patient’s personal healthcare team - their own doctor, nurse care manager, nutritionist, fitness advisor, and wellness coach. This personal team of health advisors collaborates with a patient on their care - helping them establish wellness action plans, closely monitoring their progress and key health data, and providing them personal coaching and support in achieving their health goals.

Privia works in partnership with some of the nation’s leading medical groups, hospital systems, health plans, and employers in delivering a unique, physician-directed wellness and care management solution designed to improve value and health outcomes.

funding_rounds.source_description: Privia Health Raises $12.3M from Healthcare Industry Insiders
